title: I Miss You - Hao Xiang Ni (English Version)
lyrics: I just wanna sent to you a message And tell that I miss you And I want to phone you now to say that I'm really missing you First thing happens when I wake up early Is to miss you baby Whether it rains or sunny I still miss you so much When I say that I am missing you You don't believe in me Yet you love to ask me whether I missed you I can't show you all the sweet thing So I say that I miss you And after all of this I just wish you happy I miss you I miss you I miss you I miss you I'm really really missing you And I really really so mean it I miss you I miss you I miss you I miss you I'm very very missing you I am really really missing you I miss you . Hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Shi zhen de zhen de hao xiang ni Bu shi jia de jia de hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni Shi guo li guo li hao xiang ni Zhen de xi bei xi bei hao xiang ni Hao xiang ni
